The conda package is available from the umccr channel at
<https://anaconda.org/umccr/r-tidywigits>.

```bash
conda create \
  -n tidywigits_env \
  -c umccr -c conda-forge \
  r-tidywigits==0.0.4.9001

conda activate tidywigits_env
```
